column5: The MSc in Precision Cancer Medicine is a two-year, part-time, online course run by the Department of Oncology at the University of Oxford.This course aims to provide broad training in the scientific and clinical disciplines involved in precision medicine. You will cover the scientific basis for precision medicine, genomic technologies, drug discovery and development, and the global regulatory, economic, and ethical challenges.
column7: Please see the university website for further information on fees for this course.
